price: Dia-lah yang meniupkan angin (sebagai) pembawa kabar gembira dekat sebelum kedatangan rahmat-nya (hujan) dan Kami turunkan dari langit air yang amat bersih,
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ طَهُورٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī arsala al-riyāḥa bush'ran bayna yaday raḥmatihi wa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan ṭahūran
